Html:
Radioman:

About my recent fork changing GetRectOfAllRoutes method, I think this method should return the rectangle containing just the visible routes, because this method is only called by ZoomAndCenterRoutes method.

If I'm wrong and this is not the intended behaviour, maybe we can add some bool parameter to select all/visible routes. I'm telling this because this is the way it works best for me.

Best regards,
Guillermo
